attributes.action: Petition to ban those who missed the opening of parliament from being MPs
attributes.additional_details: It would make those who are in the position take it seriously. They have to attend their work to keep their job, like everyone else
attributes.background: Ban anyone who skipped the opening of Parliament this year from being an MP. If they cannot take the time, they should not have the role

rejection.details: There hasn't been a State Opening of Parliament this year (nor will there be one until next year) so it is unclear how the petition could be actioned.
